name: DĄM IT !ą!
description:
DISCLAIMER: WEB GAME CAN BE SLOW

YOU CAN DOWNLOAD IT BELLOW

DĄM IT !ą! is a fun and challenging game where you play as a lumberjack tasked with maintaining a beautiful and thriving forest. Your mission is to plant and grow trees while also keeping the roots under control, as they tend to spread too much and cause problems. You must cut the roots whenever they become too much of a hassle, while also making sure to keep the trees healthy and well-nourished. With each passing day, new trees will grow, new roots will sprout, and new challenges will arise. Will you be able to keep the garden in top shape and be crowned the ultimate tree tamer?

Credits
